subScenes.name: 问候与需求
subScenes.description: 客户到银行问候并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! How can I help you today?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好！今天有什么可以帮您的？

responses.text: I'd like to open a new savings account.
responses.text_cn: 我想开一个新储蓄账户。

responses.text: Hey, I need to set up a checking account.
Opening an account.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I'd like来表达礼貌需求

qaPairs.speakerText: Sure thing! Do you have your ID and proof of address?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 当然！您有身份证和住址证明吗？

responses.text: Yes, here's my passport and utility bill.
responses.text_cn: 有，这是我的护照和水电账单。

responses.text: Yep, I've got both right here.
I forgot the bill. Can I use my lease?
responses.text_cn: 我忘了带账单，能用租房合同吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用here's/ I've got表达即时出示

subScenes.name: 账户类型选择
subScenes.description: 柜员介绍账户类型，客户做选择

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got basic savings with 0.5% interest, or a premium one with higher returns but a $500 minimum deposit.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有利率0.5%的基础储蓄，或高收益的高级账户，需存500美元起。

responses.text: I'll go with the basic one for now.
Hmm, I think I'd prefer the premium one—I can deposit $600.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，我想选高级的，我能存600美元。

responses.text: Basic is fine.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I'll go with表达明确选择

qaPairs.speakerText: You'll need to sign here and initial the terms.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您需要在这里签名并签署条款。

responses.text: Got it—I'll sign right away.
Sure thing, let me grab a pen.
Sign here? Okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Got it/Sure thing回应操作指令

subScenes.name: 存款与确认
subScenes.description: 客户存入首笔资金并确认账户信息

qaPairs.speakerText: How much would you like to deposit as your opening balance?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您想存多少作为初始余额？

responses.text: I'll put in $1,000.
Can I deposit $750? That's all I've got right now.
responses.text_cn: 我能存750吗？我现在就这些。

responses.text: A thousand.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I'll put in表达主动存款

qaPairs.speakerText: Your account number is 8842-1095, and your card will arrive in 5–7 business days.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您的账号是8842-1095，卡片将在5到7个工作日内寄到。

responses.text: Thanks! Can I get a digital copy now?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！现在能给我电子版吗？

responses.text: Cool, I'll check my mail.
Got it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Can I...?礼貌请求额外服务

subScenes.name: 道别与后续
subScenes.description: 柜员礼貌道别，客户表达感谢

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks for banking with us! Is there anything else I can help you with?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 感谢选择我们银行！还有其他能帮您的吗？

responses.text: No, that's all—really appreciate your help!
Nah, good to go. You're awesome!
All set, thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用That's all/All set简���结束对话

responses.text: You too! See you next time.
Thanks, you too!
Bye!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用You too!回应祝福最自然
